faq.question: How do payouts work?
faq.answer: Payouts are available after 5 trading days with a minimum of $150 profit per day. You keep 100% of profits up to $10,000, then 90% after that. Maximum payout is $5,000 per period.

faq.question: What is the scaling plan?
faq.answer: Topstep's scaling plan allows you to increase your position sizes and account sizes as you demonstrate consistent profitability. This is applied to both evaluation and funded accounts.

faq.question: Is there an activation fee?
faq.answer: No, there are no activation fees for Topstep accounts. You only pay the monthly subscription fee for evaluation accounts.

faq.question: What happens if I hit the drawdown limit?
faq.answer: If you hit the maximum drawdown limit, your account will be reset. You can purchase a reset for the same price as a new evaluation account.

faq.question: What is the consistency rule?
faq.answer: The consistency rule requires you to maintain profitable trading days. For evaluation accounts, you need to maintain 50% consistency to pass to the funded phase.

faq.question: Can I trade during news events?
faq.answer: Yes, you can trade during news and economic releases at your own risk. Topstep simply advises caution and warns about potential slippage. No time windows or restrictions are imposed.

faq.question: What is the minimum trading days to pass evaluation?
faq.answer: Topstep requires a minimum of 2 trading days to pass evaluation due to the Consistency Target requirement. The Combine can be completed in as little as two trading days because of this consistency rule.

faq.question: Why must all new Combines use TopstepX after 7 Jul 2025?
faq.answer: From 7 July 2025 TopstepX becomes the only supported platform; no new Combines can be bought on other platforms, easing support and improving funded-trader outcomes.

faq.question: What happens to legacy Quantower or NinjaTrader Combines after 1 Aug 2025?
faq.answer: After 1 Aug 2025 resets are possible only in TopstepX; failing an account on another platform means you must open the next Combine on TopstepX.
